decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: RF-DR-A-PL11 Rev B, ZZ-DR-A-PL12 Rev A, RF-DR-A-PL13 Rev B, RF-DR-A-PL14 Rev B

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | The external rating sound level emitted from the plant/ machinery/ equipment at the development shall be mitigated and limited in accordance with the assessed noise limits at noise sensitive facades by Noise Solutions Ltd in their Noise Survey report ref. 91730/NIA, dated 7th May 2024, with all plant items operating together, at maximum capacity. Approved details shall be implemented prior to use of the plant/ machinery/ equipment and thereafter be permanently retained.

Reason: To ensure that the amenity of occupiers of surrounding premises is not adversely affected by noise from mechanical installations/ equipment, in accordance with London Plan (2021) Policy D14 and the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013) 7A.

| Prior to use, machinery, plant and equipment/ extraction/ ventilation system and ducting at the development shall be mounted with proprietary anti-vibration isolators and fan motors shall be vibration isolated from the casing and adequately silenced and maintained as such.

Reason: To ensure that the amenity of occupiers of surrounding premises is not adversely affected by vibration noise from mechanical installations/ equipment, in accordance with London Plan (2021) Policy D14 and the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013) 7A. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Replacement of existing external plant on roof of the store, consisting of two gas coolers, three air source heat pumps and one VRF unit; installation of acoustic screen
